snippet.title: Silver Creek Falls: Chapter 1
snippet.description:
Silver Creek Falls: Chapter 1
Play for free - http://store.steampowered.com/app/392450
Chapter 2 out now!
Vote Yes in Greenlight for our new game- http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=495391044

Two city detectives are sent to a small idyllic town in North Carolina called ‘Silver Creek Falls” to investigate a strange series of events that the local sheriff can’t seem to get his mind around. What initially seems like an open-and-shut case unfolds into a truly terrifying mystery that will leave the detectives wondering what is real and what isn’t.

“Silver Creek Falls: Chapter 1” is the first installment in what will be a 3-part mystery thriller adventure game filled with intrigue and chaos.  This game is great for those that love adventure games like Grim Fandango but also enjoy hidden-item and mystery games.

Features:

• A deep, thrilling and immersive story
• Mysterious background stories
• Orchestral Soundtrack
• Beautiful and unique art style
• Hidden and non-hidden items
• Eerie environment
• Explore the town of “Silver Creek Falls” and unlock it’ secrets
• Original and challenging puzzles for those who like to think
• Steam Achievements
